name: Dog's Life
description: The player character is a dog named Jake, who is in love with a golden furred dog named Daisy. Daisy is kidnapped by a couple of sinister men, without her owner even knowing it. Jake sniffs around and discovers that she isn't the only dog these men have kidnapped. He sniffs, digs, pees, poos, eats, swims, jumps and begs his way through the game to obtain allies against the enemy and to save Daisy.
